name: Attribute Dictionary
description: The Attribute Dictionary defines schema attributes and includes references to the events and objects in which they are used.

emails.description: A list of emails of the person.
emails.name: Emails

first_name.description: The first name of a person.
first_name.name: First Name

last_name.description: The last name of a person.
last_name.name: Last Name

is_public.description: The indication of whether the network interface is a public IP address.
is_public.name: Public Network

managed_by.description: The distinguished name of the user that is assigned to manage this object.
managed_by.name: Managed By

ref_uid.description: The reference to a unique identifier, managed by an external system.
ref_uid.name: Reference UID

suffix.description: The suffix of a person. For example: M.D. or Ph.D..
suffix.name: Suffix

title.description: The job title of the person.
title.name: Title
